projects.name: Battle Ship
projects.body: Battle Ship is a Battle Ship game I made for my Java class. The goal of this project was to use good object oriented style to create the game. I decided to go with a slightly modified Model, View aproach. For this project I also decided to try out Java Swing, a Java UI framework. I found using this framework most interesting and at times challenging.

projects.name: Spikes
projects.body: Spikes is a game created in Ruby with Gosu. I decided to try and replicated the mobile game Don't Touch The Spikes. One of the major challenges I encountered was making my own physics engine since Gosu does not come with a physics engine to start with.
